paragraph.heading: 1Clickable view
paragraph.paragraph:
The clickable view
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_format_clickable_color.gif allows to
/tools/eiffelstudio/reference/05_general_interface_description/10_general_interface_mechanisms/10_pick_and_drop.xml pick every class or feature name in the class text and is available either through the
/tools/eiffelstudio/reference/20_editor/index.xml editor or through the Class tab of the
/tools/eiffelstudio/reference/05_general_interface_description/20_eiffelstudio_window_overview.xml context tool .
paragraph.note: Note: This view is not available to .NET classes which are imported through by means of an assembly. This is because the assembly .exe or .dll exposes only the interface methods and therefore is no implementation to display. Such classes may be viewed, in a clickable format using the Contract View or Interface View.
